title: Alternative to Scene/Monotype?
content:
Hi guys!

I'm looking for similar fonts like Scene/Monotype. Any suggestions?

TIA!

/H
author: superfetz

comments.content: What about Scene isn't working for you? That will help us find the best alternative. The first faces that come to mind are [Antenna](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013111003/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Antenna), [Ronnia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013111003/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/typetogether/ronnia_bundle/), [FF DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013111003/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=FF+DIN+OT), and [Titling Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013111003/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Titling%20Gothic).

Hey Stephen!

Scene is working just fine for me ;-) But the issue is that I've just finished a corporate identity for a customer and now the same customer wants a sub-identity with a similar typeface like Scene - so that's why I had to be inspired :-)

I'll check out your suggestions... thanks man!

//Henriko
